description: This file defines the NoteRepository interface, which extends JpaRepository for performing database operations related to Note entities in the application. It includes custom query methods to retrieve notes by user and order by update time, and to find a note by id and user.

classes.name: NoteRepository
classes.description: Repository interface for Note entity, providing data access methods.

methods.name: findAllByUserOrderByUpdatedAtDesc
methods.description: Returns a list of notes associated with a specific user, ordered by the most recently updated.

methods.name: findByIdAndUser
methods.description: Finds a note by its UUID and associated user, returning an optional result.
